RationalPiano.Graphic
Class GraphicNoteLineArray

java.lang.Object
  RationalPiano.Graphic.GraphicNoteLineArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable, IGraphicVisualizationElementArray
public class GraphicNoteLineArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGraphicVisualizationElementArray

Represents an array of several IGraphicVisualizationElement objects with iterated corresponding MIDI note numbers

Version:
1.01
Author:
Fabian Ehrentraud
Licence:
Licensed under the Open Software License (OSL 3.0)
Date:
2010-10-20

Constructor Detail

GraphicNoteLineArray

public GraphicNoteLineArray(processing.core.PApplet papplet,
                            int lineCount,
                            int midi_notestart,
                            int x_min,
                            int x_max,
                            int y_top,
                            int y_bottom,
                            double lineBend,
                            int lineColorHueInactive,
                            int lineColorHueActive,
                            int lineColorSaturation,
                            int lineColorBrightness)
Initializes the array of Note Lines

Parameters:
papplet - The processing applet to draw the note lines to
lineCount - Count of Note Lines to display
midi_notestart - The MIDI note number of the leftmost line, the other lines have incremental MIDI note numbers
x_min - The left x coordinate relative to the PApplet window to start the drawing of the lines; x_min < x_max
x_max - The right x coordinate relative to the PApplet window to start the drawing of the lines; x_min < x_max
y_top - The top y coordinate relative to the PApplet window to start the drawing of the lines; y_top < y_bottom
y_bottom - The bottom y coordinate relative to the PApplet window to start the drawing of the lines; y_top < y_bottom
lineBend - Nonlnearly transforms the set line widths; 0lineColorHueInactive - Color hue of the lines that are not active. 0<=lineColorHueInactive<=255
lineColorHueActive - Color hue of the lines that are active. 0<=lineColorHueActive<=255
lineColorSaturation - Color saturation of the lines. 0<=lineColorSaturation<=255
lineColorBrightness - Color brightness of the lines. 0<=lineColorBrightness<=255
Method Detail

getElementNote

public int getElementNote(int at_x,
                          int at_y)
Description copied from interface: IGraphicVisualizationElementArray
Gets the MIDI note number of the element at the specified coordinate

Specified by:
getElementNote in interface IGraphicVisualizationElementArray
Parameters:
at_x - X coordinate
at_y - Y coordinate
Returns:
MIDI note number of the element at the specified coordinate; -1 in case that the coordinates are out of the area of this visualization array

Returns:
The lowest Midi note number of all elements
